text: The Fort de Joux (or Ch√¢teau de Joux) is a castle, transformed into a fort, in France. It is located in La Cluse-et-Mijoux in the Doubs department in the Jura mountains. Category:Castles in France Category:Forts in Europe Category:Doubs Category:15th-century buildings and structures
title: Fort-de-Joux
